title: The Girls of Summer
description: Rachel and Alistairâ€™s life-changing summer love affair on a sun-trapped Greek island has consumed her since she was seventeen. But as Rachel becomes increasingly obsessed with reliving the events of so long ago, and reconnects with the other girls who were similarly drawn to life on the island, dark secrets about her first love affair begin to rise to the surface. For fans of My Dark Vanessa.
author: Katie  Bishop
